given by blocked gauge swatches **pattern information** introducing monstera sweater inspired by the textures of monstera leaves the main body part is created with a plain stitch while the sleeves are created with an openwork stitch the sweater is worked bottom up in four panels one back panel one front panel and two sleeve panels the finishing of the collar is crocheted onto the body once it s
